entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 p.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
